2025 Responsible AI Transparency Report

This document is the second annual Responsible AI Transparency Report released in May 2024. It details the company's approach to building, deploying, and supporting generative AI systems responsibly. The report focuses on key areas including governance, risk assessment, mitigation strategies, and customer support. Specifically, it outlines the company‚Äôs policies, people, and processes related to responsible AI development. A significant portion is dedicated to mapping and assessing risks associated with generative AI systems, followed by measures to mitigate those risks. The report also addresses the crucial aspect of managing AI risks through proactive strategies. Furthermore, it explores the company‚Äôs approach to releasing AI systems, including deployment safety and the Sensitive Uses and Emerging Technologies program. A core element of the report is the commitment to supporting customers in building AI responsibly, encompassing AI Customer Commitments and providing relevant tooling. Transparency is emphasized as a key pillar, aiming to empower customers to develop and utilize AI technologies ethically and safely. The document highlights the company's ongoing investments in research and its dedication to advancing AI innovation while maintaining good governance. Crucially, it incorporates feedback received from stakeholders globally, demonstrating a commitment to continuous improvement and adaptation. The report‚Äôs scope extends beyond internal practices to encompass the broader ecosystem, acknowledging the importance of collaboration and multi-stakeholder input. The document‚Äôs release signifies a continued dedication to building trust in AI technologies and fostering responsible innovation. The past year has seen a wave of AI adoption by organizations of all sizes, further emphasizing the need for robust and transparent AI governance frameworks.
